name: Hungry Unicorn
description:
Play the brand new Hungry Unicorn App and be the best of all your friends.

On your exciting way to all the hearts you need to find the best way to get to the top of the high score.

What can you expect with Hungry Unicorn:

- Improve your skills
- Exciting Graphics
- An exciting adventure with the Unicorn
- Be the best of your friends and climb the high score up!
- Be fast enough and collect the most hearts

For more info, simply go to www.hungry-unicorn.app or write to us with questions, suggestions, improvements and criticism at info@hungry-unicorn.app
